ygData.subject: RE: weapons upgrade?
ygData.msgSnippet: Depends on the server your on.  The normal going price on the older servers is around 200 to 250 plat.  The claw is almost ALWAYS given as the drop from the
ygData.messageBody:
Depends on the server your on. The normal going price on the older servers
is around 200 to 250 plat. The claw is almost ALWAYS given as the drop from
the mob. The only time I have not seen the claw as a drop is when he drops
the rubicite breast plate. If you attend the bazaars that most servers have
they (all items sold) are always inflated because the demand for the items
becomes much greater and the bid wars get obscene.

Dyvim Kincaid
Cazic Thule
Daks
Quellious
-----Original Message-----
From: shaner [mailto:shaner@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 29, 1999 2:13 PM
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] weapons upgrade?


200?! Try like 500+. they are off of the avatar of fear(lvl38) the same
guy that drops the rubicite breastplate.

Nochtero D'Ebonfury
24th Warrior
Cazic-Thule
-----Original Message-----
From: John Cynkar <ref145@...>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, July 29, 1999 2:43 PM
Subject: [warriors_eq] weapons upgrade?


Just go and get Bladed Thulian claws (5,19), they will go good with your
dirk. They Sell for around 200p.

Dubas Valandil
20th lvl Half Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server
